translation.en: GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: It's okay, son...
translation.zh: 没事 孩子

translation.en: I know you want this to be over.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想这么下去了

translation.en: I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里

translation.en: I will be right here...
translation.zh: 我会一直在这里

translation.en: But, you don't give up.
translation.zh: 但你不能放弃

translation.en: You hear me?
translation.zh: 你听到吗？

translation.en: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.zh: 只要还有一口气 就要战斗下去

translation.en: You breathe... keep breathing.
translation.zh: 吸气 保持吸气

translation.en: Ah, shit.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Goddamn sumbitches.
translation.zh: 他妈的 那兔崽子

translation.en: The sumbitch got shit for brains.
translation.zh: 就是个蠢货

translation.en: -You seen Coulter? TRAPPER: Nope.
translation.zh: -看见库特了吗？ -没有

translation.en: Listen up!
translation.zh: 听着！等他们把河狸皮弄干净

translation.en: When them plews is cleaned, I want you to hoop 'em up real tight.
translation.zh: 听着！等他们把河狸皮弄干净 你们就得绝对箍紧

translation.en: Remember, we're not doing no 15-pelt bales!
translation.zh: 记住 每捆皮不是打15张 是30张！

translation.en: -We're doing 30-pelt bales! HENRY: Fitzgerald!
translation.zh: 记住 每捆皮不是打15张 是30张！ 菲茨杰拉德！

translation.en: Cap'n.
translation.zh: 头儿

translation.en: Where are we with the haul? What are you thinking?
translation.zh: 货都准备得怎么样了？ 你觉得怎么样？ 怎么说呢…

translation.en: I'm thinking, whatever it is they're hunting out there...
translation.zh: 不管他们猎什么玩艺儿

translation.en: ...I hope it don't need another shot.
translation.zh: 都得一枪完事儿

translation.en: Make sure we're ready to head out by dawn.
translation.zh: 天亮之前必须离开这里

translation.en: Been done by this morning.
translation.zh: 早晨就好了

translation.en: I'd have liked to be out by now, but the men are too tired.
translation.zh: 你也知道 早就该走了 没走成 他们太累了

translation.en: We're only a few days from the fort. We're trapped out.
translation.zh: 再有几天就能到要塞 猎物也捕得差不多了

translation.en: All we have to worry about is fresh meat for the boys.
translation.zh: 再就是给大伙弄点肉吃

translation.en: Well, you, uh, seen Coulter?
translation.zh: 你 看见库特了吗？

translation.en: JIM: Hey, we took down an elk. A big one.
translation.zh: 嘿 捕到一只麋鹿 一只大家伙

translation.en: We need help to haul the meat back.
translation.zh: 需要人手把它弄回去

translation.en: Let me know when it's on the spit. I'll help you with it then.
translation.zh: 挂上烤肉架告诉我一声 我过来帮忙

translation.en: Come on, I need your help.
translation.zh: 别啊！拜托 现在就要帮忙

translation.en: We needed help when we were loading them bales.
translation.zh: 没错 我们撅着屁股忙活就需要人手啊

translation.en: I been eating this damn beaver meat so long...
translation.zh: 出来这么多天一直吃这破河狸

translation.en: ...I'm starting to miss my wife's cooking.
translation.zh: 现在最想的是我老婆做的饭

translation.en: -I'm starting to miss your wife. -Shut up.
translation.zh: -妈的 我也开始想你老婆了 -你闭嘴

translation.en: COULTER: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Help.
translation.zh: 救命…

translation.en: TRAPPER 1: Is that Coulter?
translation.zh: 是库特吗？ 大家都过来！

translation.en: You go get the Captain.
translation.zh: 你去找老大

translation.en: STUBBY BILL: Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 人他妈都哪儿去了？ 布恩中枪了

translation.en: TRAPPER 2: Anybody see them?
translation.zh: 啊 上帝啊 -有谁看见过他们？ -看不到他们

translation.en: TRAPPER 3: Stay quiet. TRAPPER 4: Watch the ridge.
translation.zh: -静一下 -别出声

translation.en: HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: What was that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Pa?
translation.zh: 爸

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [WHISPERS] They got Thomas.
translation.zh: 他们把托马斯做了

translation.en: I can't see 'em. I can't see 'em.
translation.zh: 我看不到他们

translation.en: HENRY: Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下！

translation.en: We're surrounded! They're everywhere!
translation.zh: 到处都是他们的人 我们被包围了 别跑

translation.en: HENRY: Stay here! Stay here!
translation.zh: 别跑

translation.en: Paul, no!
translation.zh: 不！保罗

translation.en: -They want us out in the open. TRAPPER 3: Someone get him help!
translation.zh: 他们想逼我们进开阔地

translation.en: Nobody move! Stay where you are!
translation.zh: 都别动 呆在原地！

translation.en: They want the pelts.
translation.zh: 他们是冲我们的货来的

translation.en: We got to get on that boat right now or we'll lose it all.
translation.zh: 马上运到船上 不然都被抢光了

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Get to the boat! To the boat, son! Move!
translation.zh: 快上船！ 快上船 儿子！快上船！快！ 快！

translation.en: Move, move!
translation.zh: 快上船 儿子！快上船！快！ 快！

translation.en: Leave the furs! Leave the furs! To the boat!
translation.zh: 把皮货留下！快上船！

translation.en: Hawk!
translation.zh: 霍克！

translation.en: Hawk!
translation.zh: 霍克！

translation.en: Hawk!
translation.zh: 霍克！

translation.en: Grab some pelts! Come on, grab the pelts!
translation.zh: 抓些皮子！抓些皮子！

translation.en: DAVE: Give this to my little girl.
translation.zh: 这个给我女儿

translation.en: You're coming with us. I'll get help.
translation.zh: 你得跟我们走 我不会把你留下

translation.en: GLASS: Leave the furs! Leave the pelts!
translation.zh: 快上船 把皮货留下 不要管皮货了

translation.en: Willman!
translation.zh: 威廉

translation.en: Get to the boat!
translation.zh: 格拉斯！ 快上船

translation.en: Fucking savage!
translation.zh: 可恶的蛮子

translation.en: Get on the fucking boat!
translation.zh: 带上皮货！ 来这边

translation.en: HENRY: Cut the rope! Cut the rope!
translation.zh: 不行 砍断绳子 砍断绳子

translation.en: Wait for Amos!
translation.zh: 我说 等等阿莫斯

translation.en: No! We go now!
translation.zh: 不行 不能等了 马上走

translation.en: Fire the cannon!
translation.zh: 开炮

translation.en: AMOS: Don't leave! Wait!
translation.zh: 别走 等等

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] My daughter, Powaqa, is not here.
translation.zh: 我的女儿普瓦卡不在这

translation.en: Collect all the pelts we can carry.
translation.zh: 把所有能带走的皮子都带走

translation.en: We'll trade pelts with the French for horses and keep searching for her.
translation.zh: 拿这些皮子跟法国人做交易 换到马匹 继续找女儿

translation.en: HENRY: --and dust becomes flour...
translation.zh: 尘归尘 土归土

translation.en: ...and when the morning is clear... ...this child of God will meet Jesus Christ himself. Amen.
translation.zh: 当黎明来临 上帝之子终将与耶稣相逢

translation.en: MAN 1: Amen. MAN 2: Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: HENRY: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Hold still.
translation.zh: 屏住气

translation.en: ANDERSON: Where did you learn that?
translation.zh: 这本事跟谁学的？

translation.en: My father was a doctor. Bridger!
translation.zh: 我父亲是个医生 布里杰

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Captain, we got a swarm of tree niggers...
translation.zh: 头儿 岸上全是印第安人 要把我们斩尽杀绝啊

translation.en: ...out here waiting to finish the job.
translation.zh: 头儿 岸上全是印第安人 要把我们斩尽杀绝啊 -摁住了 -好

translation.en: Tell me you got some kind of plan.
translation.zh: 说说你有什么办法？

translation.en: Glass?
translation.zh: 格拉斯

translation.en: Missouri's no good.
translation.zh: 密苏里不安全

translation.en: Not while the Ree's running it.
translation.zh: 是他们的领地

translation.en: We got to get off this boat.
translation.zh: 我们不能坐船

translation.en: Oh, you want to get off the boat?
translation.zh: 你想放弃船？

translation.en: Then what do we do, huh?
translation.zh: 然后怎么办？

translation.en: Take our furs and sit out there amongst the Ree like a bunch of ducks?
translation.zh: 难道说拿着一堆皮子 坐等阿里卡拉人来杀死我们？

translation.en: Only safe thing to do is track a new course back up on land.
translation.zh: 唯一安全的办法是新找一条陆路

translation.en: That'll add weeks to the trip.
translation.zh: 那行程就要多出几个星期

translation.en: Better than floating where they can get eyes on us.
translation.zh: 那也比漂在河上被他们盯着强

translation.en: They got eyes on you right now, son.
translation.zh: 他们已经盯上你了 年轻人

translation.en: What I'm saying is we stay on the boat.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 先留在船上找到一条通往要塞的路

translation.en: Chart a course toward the fort and take our chances on the water.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 先留在船上找到一条通往要塞的路 在水路碰机会

translation.en: Glass knows this territory best. It's his job to get us home safe.
translation.zh: 格拉斯对这一带比我们都熟悉 他的任务是保证我们安全 我想试试

translation.en: -Get us home safe? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -能让我们安全返回？ -是的

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Need I remind you we already lost 32 men?
translation.zh: 我提醒你 我们已经损失了三十二人

translation.en: It's 33 now. They were my men, Fitzgerald. I know how many I lost.
translation.zh: 现在是三十三 都是我带来的 我知道我失去了多少人

translation.en: We do like Glass says. That's the end of it.
translation.zh: 现在 按格拉斯说的做 到此为止

translation.en: GLASS: We have to set the boat loose. If the Ree are tracking us, they'll find it downriver.
translation.zh: 把船放走 让阿里卡拉人到下游找我们吧

translation.en: Best course is to hike inland to the Grand and follow it to Fort Kiowa.
translation.zh: 沿内陆徒步走 到达基奥瓦要塞

translation.en: On foot? It'll be winter before we get there.
translation.zh: 什么？徒步？走到冬天都到不了

translation.en: Yeah, unless we come across a post, trade for some horses.
translation.zh: 要是能路过一个集市换些马匹呢？

translation.en: Ain't no posts that far over!
translation.zh: 那么远的地方没有集市

translation.en: Captain, losing this boat is a goddamn mistake.
translation.zh: 好吧 头儿 弃船就是他妈的大错

translation.en: The Ree ain't that stupid.
translation.zh: 再说 阿里卡拉人也不傻

translation.en: We keep it, we can lay it up around Arrow's Peak.
translation.zh: 我们要是把船留着 还能在箭峰登陆

translation.en: Quit acting like you know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 行了 快省省吧 你在说什么呢 菲茨杰拉德

translation.en: Ain't nobody talking to you. Who'd listen to you anyway?
translation.zh: 谁来跟你问过？谁愿意听你的？

translation.en: Can't find your way out of your breeches to take a shit.
translation.zh: 你他妈拉个屎都不知道怎么脱裤子

translation.en: All I'm saying is Camp Rhulen is just up the way.
translation.zh: -我想说的是… -来 布莱恩 乎伦兵营就是那个方向

translation.en: We can hole up there.
translation.zh: 我们可以钻进去躲一躲

translation.en: We walk.
translation.zh: 走着去

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure we will.
translation.zh: 对 肯定行

translation.en: Wish my dad was a doctor. Then he could've bought me a captain's job.
translation.zh: 我要是有个当医生的爹 也能给我买个队长当当

translation.en: What do we do, eh?
translation.zh: 现在能做什么？

translation.en: Pray these pelts ain't rotten if we ever get back here?
translation.zh: 祈祷这些货别在我们取的时候烂掉？

translation.en: HENRY: Make sure to mark this place. We're leaving a fortune under these rocks.
translation.zh: 记着在这儿做个标记 这些石头下面可藏着大财富呢 这里没地方 你们得把货往上边运

translation.en: Glass, chart a course.
translation.zh: 这里没地方 你们得把货往上边运 格拉斯 看地图找个道儿

translation.en: Tightest you can that gets us around the Ree.
translation.zh: 能绕过阿里卡拉人的最近的路

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 好嘞头儿

translation.en: FITZGERALD: This ain't right.
translation.zh: 这可不行

translation.en: We all know these furs ain't gonna be here by the time we come back.
translation.zh: -回去看看 -这可不行 等我们回来这些皮货早就没了

translation.en: There's no way we can haul them all the way to the fort.
translation.zh: 不可能把这么多货拖到要塞啊 条件不允许

translation.en: Arikara are all through the territory. We'll want our hands free.
translation.zh: 况且这一带到处是阿里卡拉人 我们得把手腾出来

translation.en: We're gonna lose those pelts.
translation.zh: 我跟你说这些货等于丢了

translation.en: -You rather keep the pelts or your life? -Life?
translation.zh: -你是要命还是要货？ -命？

translation.en: What life you talking about? I ain't got no life.
translation.zh: 什么命啊？我就是烂命一条

translation.en: I just got living and the only way I get that is through these pelts.
translation.zh: 我唯一能指着活命的就是这些皮货

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的 拿好 菲茨

translation.en: Ain't no way I'm going home after six months working my ass off like a mule...
translation.zh: 我脖子挂裤带上 像骡子一样忙活半年

translation.en: ...risking my neck, men dying, and for what?
translation.zh: 就这样空着手回家 凭什么呀

translation.en: Damn near lost everything. Job's been fucked from the start!
translation.zh: 这一趟开始就他妈的背

translation.en: There's the one been fucking us.
translation.zh: 就这破玩意害死我们了

translation.en: You wonder how the Ree got the dead drop on us...
translation.zh: 有谁想过没有 阿里卡拉人怎么能偷袭到我们？

translation.en: ...when Mr. Glass was supposed to look out for that very thing?
translation.zh: 格拉斯先生可是负责观察那玩艺儿的

translation.en: All them Pawnee buddies of his.
translation.zh: 那些波尼族人可都是他的哥们儿

translation.en: Pawnee's as much against the Ree as the rest of us.
translation.zh: 波尼族人和我们一样 跟阿里卡拉人有仇

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, what about his little half-breed son?
translation.zh: 他那个 杂种儿子呢？

translation.en: What kind of savage you think his mama was?
translation.zh: 他儿子的妈会是个什么蛮子啊？

translation.en: Oh, lay off the boy, Fitz.
translation.zh: 别扯到孩子 菲茨 哥们 拿好了

translation.en: All I'm saying is...
translation.zh: 我说的是…

translation.en: ...a savage is savage.
translation.zh: 蛮子就是蛮子

translation.en: Hey, Glass...
translation.zh: 格拉斯

translation.en: ...is it true what they say...
translation.zh: 他们说 你跟蛮子住的时候杀了一个中尉

translation.en: ...about you shooting a lieutenant while living with them savages?
translation.zh: 他们说 你跟蛮子住的时候杀了一个中尉 真的吗？

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Twenty-one dead soldiers and 40 dead feathernecks.
translation.zh: 死了二十一个兵 四十个印第安人

translation.en: But you and your boy the only ones to walk out alive.
translation.zh: 只有你跟你那孩子活着出来

translation.en: Kind of a miracle.
translation.zh: 只有你跟你那孩子活着出来 你不觉得是个奇迹吗？

translation.en: HENRY: Shut up, Fitzgerald.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 菲茨杰拉德

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Is that what you did?
translation.zh: 是不是你耍的花招？

translation.en: Shot one of your own to save this little dog here?
translation.zh: 杀一个白的 去救这个狗崽子？

translation.en: Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: Why? Was he playing with this little boy's mama, huh?
translation.zh: 为什么？他干了这小子他妈？

translation.en: HENRY: Fitzgerald! -Did he kill her?
translation.zh: -菲茨杰拉德！ -然后又杀了她？

translation.en: Hey, you can quit polishing that rifle when I'm talking to you.
translation.zh: 跟你说话呐 别擦那破枪了

translation.en: I'm working on it.
translation.zh: 我忙着呢

translation.en: You can work on it when I'm done talking to you. Look at me.
translation.zh: 等我跟你说完你再擦也不迟 探子

translation.en: HENRY: That's enough!
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: You're forgetting your place, boy.
translation.zh: 别忘了你所在的位置 小子

translation.en: As far as I can tell, my place is here on the smart end of this rifle.
translation.zh: 我可以说的是 我就在枪的这一头

translation.en: HENRY: You move along, Fitzgerald. That's an order!
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德 赶紧走 这是命令

translation.en: Listen! There's only a couple hours of light left.
translation.zh: 听我说 还有两小时天就黑了

translation.en: We got to stash these pelts and get rid of the boat.
translation.zh: 听我说 还有两小时天就黑了 把船丢掉 快走

translation.en: -Let's go! MAN: Yes, captain.
translation.zh: 把船丢掉 快走 都藏好了头儿 都藏好了

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I told you to be invisible, son.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过别出头 孩子

translation.en: At least he...
translation.zh: 至少他…

translation.en: --If you want to survive, keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: 要想活着 就低头看着地 闭上嘴

translation.en: - At least he hear me... - They don't hear your voice!
translation.zh: -至少他们听见我了… -他们白人听不到你的声音 孩子

translation.en: They just see the color of your face.
translation.zh: 他们只看到你的肤色

translation.en: You understand?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: You have to listen to me, son.
translation.zh: 你要听我的…

translation.en: You have to listen.
translation.zh: 你必须听

translation.en: HENRY: Beckett!
translation.zh: 贝克特！

translation.en: Weston!
translation.zh: 威斯顿！

translation.en: JONES: Why are they not jumping?
translation.zh: 他们怎么不跳？

translation.en: STUBBY BILL: It looks like they changed their minds.
translation.zh: 好像改变了主意

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Smart sumbitches. Smart.
translation.zh: 兔崽子们 够聪明的

translation.en: I ought to be on that boat.
translation.zh: 我要是在船上就好了

translation.en: They did the right thing.
translation.zh: 他们做得对

translation.en: GLASS: It's time to move.
translation.zh: 该走了

translation.en: Get up.
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: We're headed out.
translation.zh: 出发

translation.en: I'm coming.
translation.zh: 我来了

translation.en: It's better you lay down.
translation.zh: 你躺着吧

translation.en: When the rest of the men are ready you send them to me.
translation.zh: 等他们准备好了 让他们去找我

translation.en: I'm going west.
translation.zh: 我往西北方向走

translation.en: You are my son.
translation.zh: 你是我儿子

translation.en: WARRIOR 1 [IN ARIKARA]: There are only two here.
translation.zh: 这里就两个白人

translation.en: ELK DOG [IN ARIKARA]: Powaqa is not here.
translation.zh: 普瓦卡不在这儿

translation.en: WARRIOR 1: The others probably took her.
translation.zh: 可能是其他白人带走了她

translation.en: They went north.
translation.zh: 他们往北边去了

translation.en: ELK DOG: We'll pick up their tracks on the mountain.
translation.zh: 我们能在山上找到他们踪迹

translation.en: HENRY: Was it the right decision? Leaving the boat?
translation.zh: 那决定真的对吗？ 把船丢弃掉？

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] The Ree own that river. They would've flanked us.
translation.zh: 这条河的主人是阿里卡拉人 他们一定能封死我们的路

translation.en: We stay east of the Grand through the mountains...
translation.zh: 我们沿着河东穿越大山

translation.en: ...we cut a week off our trip.
translation.zh: 行程可以缩短一周

translation.en: Lands are bone dry up there. Nothing for the Ree to hunt.
translation.zh: 那里的地都干透了 阿里卡拉人没什么可猎

translation.en: HENRY: Except us.
translation.zh: 除了我们

translation.en: GLASS: Except us.
translation.zh: 除了我们

translation.en: Is it true what Fitzgerald said?
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德说的是真的吗？

translation.en: Is that why you came out here to the edge of the world?
translation.zh: 就因为那事 你来到这个鸟都不拉屎的地方？

translation.en: Glass?
translation.zh: 格拉斯？

translation.en: I do like the quiet.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这份安静

translation.en: Your boy...
translation.zh: 你儿子…

translation.en: ...he's seen a lot.
translation.zh: 他经历了很多

translation.en: He got a mother you need to get him back to?
translation.zh: 你要带他回去找妈妈？

translation.en: JIM: Mr. Glass!
translation.zh: 格拉斯

translation.en: There are cubs here!
translation.zh: 熊宝宝在这里 格拉斯

translation.en: We got cubs here!
translation.zh: 熊宝宝在这里

translation.en: Christ Almighty.
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: He's down here!
translation.zh: 他在那儿

translation.en: ANDERSON: Keep your eyes open. There's bears around.
translation.zh: 睁大眼睛注意了 这里有熊

translation.en: JIM: I need your help now!
translation.zh: 快点 我需要你帮忙

translation.en: HENRY: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Get me rags now!
translation.zh: -头儿 头儿 -给我些布

translation.en: Give me rags before he bleeds out. Rags.
translation.zh: 给我些布帮他止血 给我些布

translation.en: Prepare the kit. Bridger! You hold that.
translation.zh: 准备好急救包 布里杰 按住了

translation.en: Easy. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: ANDERSON: Got to give him credit for taking that grizz down with him.
translation.zh: 他真了不起 把那么大个的棕熊给杀了

translation.en: He shouldn't have shot. The place is crawling with tree niggers.
translation.zh: 他不该开枪 会招来该死的阿里卡拉人

translation.en: HENRY: That's enough! That's enough! We're still in Ree territory.
translation.zh: 得了 够了 够了！我们还在阿里卡拉人的地盘

translation.en: He's one of our own men.
translation.zh: 够了！我们还在阿里卡拉人的地盘 他是我们的人 真倒霉！

translation.en: Scout a circle around us. North and west. Take those two with you.
translation.zh: 你出去察看一下 北边和西边 你带上他们两个人

translation.en: Bill, Fryman, you take south and east.
translation.zh: 弗里曼 你去南边和东边

translation.en: Watch for anyone that might've heard that shot.
translation.zh: -凡是能听到枪声的人都留意一下 -是

translation.en: We have to stitch him up.
translation.zh: 我们都要留意

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] What about me? Captain?
translation.zh: 我能干什么？头儿

translation.en: You just stay here.
translation.zh: 你就待在这里 好吗？

translation.en: Hold it down.
translation.zh: 你抓着他这儿

translation.en: JIM: I'm so sorry, Mr. Glass. HENRY: Bridger, press down here.
translation.zh: 对不起 格拉斯先生 会没事的 布里杰 他这里一直流血

translation.en: JIM: He's bleeding down here, too.
translation.zh: 这里也在流血

translation.en: ANDERSON: They're torturing the bastard.
translation.zh: 简直是在折磨那兔崽子

translation.en: The proper thing to do would be to finish him off quick.
translation.zh: 现在最该做的 你知道 就是尽快帮他了结

translation.en: Unless he has a chance of pulling through.
translation.zh: 除非他能躲过这一劫

translation.en: Pulling through?
translation.zh: 躲过一劫？

translation.en: You saw what that grizz did to him. -He'll be dead inside an hour. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 看看那畜生怎么伤的他 活不过一小时

translation.en: Yeah, we all will be if he don't quit wailing like that.
translation.zh: 没错 就算他不死 也得把我们挨个叫唤死

translation.en: Toward you and twist it into place. I'll hold him. Go.
translation.zh: 把腿往你那边拉 然后拧到位 抓好了吗？

translation.en: -Pa. HENRY: Hold him. Go.
translation.zh: -爸 -抓好了吗？走起

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 走起

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: He passed out.
translation.zh: 他昏过去了

translation.en: I'll take advantage and stitch up his neck.
translation.zh: 好 正好趁机给他脖子缝针 我看看

translation.en: Water.
translation.zh: 水

translation.en: Bridger, tell the others we'll camp here tonight.
translation.zh: 布里杰 告诉其他人今晚在这里扎营

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里

translation.en: I'll be right here...
translation.zh: 我会一直在这里…

translation.en: [IN FRENCH] Toussaint, he's here.
translation.zh: 杜桑 他来了

translation.en: [IN FRENCH] I thought he wouldn't make it.
translation.zh: 我以为他到不了这儿

translation.en: I'm glad you made it here.
translation.zh: 很高兴你能来

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] We need horses and rifles.
translation.zh: 我们需要马和来福枪

translation.en: We bring you many pelts.
translation.zh: 我们给你们带来了很多皮子

translation.en: No horses... just what we agreed.
translation.zh: 没有马…就按说好的

translation.en: Take all the pelts you want.
translation.zh: 把你们想要的皮子都拿走

translation.en: We need horses and rifles.
translation.zh: 我们需要马和来福枪

translation.en: I need a woman with big tits...
translation.zh: 我需要一个大胸的女人

translation.en: Who can cook.
translation.zh: 会做饭的

translation.en: INTERPRETER [IN ARIKARA]: We can't give you any horses.
translation.zh: 我们没有马给你们

translation.en: TOUSSAINT: What's he saying?
translation.zh: 他说什么？

translation.en: INTERPRETER [IN FRENCH]: I don't know, something about horses.
translation.zh: 我不知道 好像是关于马

translation.en: Bring us something to drink... some whiskey.
translation.zh: 给我们拿些喝的… 威士忌

translation.en: Tell him to stop asking about the horses.
translation.zh: 跟他说别再提马的事了

translation.en: Always good doing business with you.
translation.zh: 我们之间的生意一直不错

translation.en: Horses.
translation.zh: 马匹

translation.en: No horses.
translation.zh: 没有马

translation.en: All we can trade are guns and ammunition.
translation.zh: 我们能交易的只有枪和弹药

translation.en: Tell him if he asks about horses again, there is no deal.
translation.zh: 告诉他们如果再提马的话 生意就不做了

translation.en: Where did you get these? The Americans?
translation.zh: 你们从哪里找到这些 美国人那儿？

translation.en: They're already branded.
translation.zh: 已经打上商标有主了

translation.en: I'll only be able to get half price for them.
translation.zh: 只能给他们个半价

translation.en: Get him away from there.
translation.zh: 让他们赶紧离开那儿

translation.en: I said no horses.
translation.zh: 说过了 没有马

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] We'll take these three horses.
translation.zh: 这三匹马我们要了

translation.en: I'm not going to say it again.
translation.zh: 不要让我再说一遍

translation.en: They aren't part of the deal.
translation.zh: 马不在咱们的交易里

translation.en: Now tell your man to step away.
translation.zh: 现在让你的人快离开

translation.en: We had an agreement, you have to honor it.
translation.zh: 我们之间有协议 你必须遵守

translation.en: [IN FRENCH] You stand there and talk to me about honor?
translation.zh: 你站在那儿跟我谈遵守协议？

translation.en: INTERPRETER: I told you he speaks French.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过他会讲法语

translation.en: Those pelts are stolen.
translation.zh: 这些皮子都是偷来的

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] You all have stolen everything from us.
translation.zh: 你们的东西都是从我们那里偷的

translation.en: Everything!
translation.zh: 所有的东西

translation.en: The land.
translation.zh: 土地

translation.en: The animals.
translation.zh: 牲畜

translation.en: Two white men snuck into our village, and took my daughter, Powaqa.
translation.zh: 两个白人溜进我们村 把我女儿普瓦卡抢走了

translation.en: We leave you these pelts because honor demands it.
translation.zh: 我们把皮子留给你们是因为信誉使然

translation.en: I take your horses to find my daughter.
translation.zh: 我拿你们的马去找我女儿

translation.en: You are free to try and stop me.
translation.zh: 你也可以试试不让我拿

translation.en: Business is business.
translation.zh: 生意就是生意

translation.en: Prepare five horses for them.
translation.zh: 给他们准备五匹马

translation.en: HENRY: I want everybody up at the crack of dawn.
translation.zh: 希望大家天一亮都起来

translation.en: Carrying Glass will be hard, so we need to get ahead as far as possible.
translation.zh: 抬着格拉斯我们快不了 所以我们需要 尽可能早点动身

translation.en: We'll divide into two groups.
translation.zh: 分成两组

translation.en: Fitzgerald, Jones, Fryman, you take the east side of the river.
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德 琼斯 弗里曼 你们走河东边

translation.en: Anderson, you scout up front.
translation.zh: 安德森已经探过路了

translation.en: That claw don't belong to you.
translation.zh: 那个爪子不是你的

translation.en: It ain't for me.
translation.zh: 我替他做的

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手 菲茨杰拉德！住手！

translation.en: HENRY: Don't let him down! Don't let him down!
translation.zh: 该死的 别把他放下来 听到没有

translation.en: ANDERSON: Watch it.
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: JONES: How we gonna make it up this?
translation.zh: 这么下去可怎么行

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Slow down.
translation.zh: 再坚持一下

translation.en: ANDERSON: It's killing us, captain!
translation.zh: 实在受不了了 妈的

translation.en: HENRY: Lift it, Bridger!
translation.zh: 提起来 布里杰

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Goddamn it, keep it steady.
translation.zh: 妈的 你们那边抬稳点行吗

translation.en: JIM: Lift it up higher. HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I am.
translation.zh: 你们那边抬高点

translation.en: JONES: I'll go up and pull.
translation.zh: 我们只能拖着了 抓好了

translation.en: My foot!
translation.zh: 真是受够了

translation.en: Enough of this shit!
translation.zh: 这么着永远翻不过这座山

translation.en: We'll never make it across like this, captain.
translation.zh: 不能这样了 够了

translation.en: He's burning up.
translation.zh: 他发高烧了

translation.en: Cap'n, you ain't doing us nor him no favors...
translation.zh: 头儿 你不会就这么 看着大家跟他这么受罪吧

translation.en: ...by letting him go on suffering like this.
translation.zh: 头儿 你不会就这么 看着大家跟他这么受罪吧 队长

translation.en: Captain, it's all the same up here.
translation.zh: 队长 这边的路都是这样

translation.en: We're gonna have to go back. Find another way.
translation.zh: 我们得返回去 另找一条路 妈的

translation.en: Glass. Hugh.
translation.zh: 格拉斯 休

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Lay that rag over his eyes, Mr. Bridger.
translation.zh: 拿块布盖上他的眼睛 布里杰先生

translation.en: HAWK: What?
translation.zh: 干嘛？先生 我做不到

translation.en: HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. HAWK: Wait!
translation.zh: 盖上他的眼睛 干嘛？等等

translation.en: HENRY: I'm sorry, Hugh.
translation.zh: -等等 -对不起 休

translation.en: JIM: Sir, I can't do that.
translation.zh: 我们怎么能扔下他自己回去？

translation.en: HAWK: How do we get back without him? Only he knows the way.
translation.zh: 我们怎么能扔下他自己回去？ 他是唯一认路的人 等等

translation.en: HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. JIM: I can't.
translation.zh: 他是唯一认路的人 等等

translation.en: Wait! How do we get back--
translation.zh: 等等 我们怎么能 把他的眼睛用布盖上

translation.en: HENRY: Lay it over his eyes!
translation.zh: 把他的眼睛用布蒙上 把他拉住

translation.en: Step back.
translation.zh: 现在退一步 不 布里杰 布里杰

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: Bridger, stop! Bridger, Henry. Henry! Henry, please.
translation.zh: 布里杰 住手 布里杰 亨利 亨利 求你了 队长 留下他吧 求你了

translation.en: Captain. Captain. Please. Please leave....
translation.zh: 求你了 队长 留下他吧 求你了

translation.en: There's a $70 bonus from the Rocky Mountain Fur Company to the two men...
translation.zh: 留下两人陪格拉斯直到他离去

translation.en: ...that stay with Glass to see this through.
translation.zh: 落基山皮货公司支付每人70美金

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I'll stay!
translation.zh: 我愿意留下来

translation.en: Me too. Money or not, I'll stay.
translation.zh: 我也愿意 给不给钱我都会留下来

translation.en: I'll need a third.
translation.zh: 我还需要第三个人

translation.en: Sorry, captain.
translation.zh: 对不起 队长

translation.en: I have a family. I'm not crazy.
translation.zh: 我有家 不能不理智

translation.en: Captain, three men can't hold off a party of Ree...
translation.zh: 队长 三个人 也抵挡不了那些阿里卡拉人

translation.en: ...much less some boys.
translation.zh: 更何况他们都还是孩子

translation.en: Besides, $70 ain't gonna buy nobody a new set of ears.
translation.zh: 再说70美金连一对耳朵都买不来

translation.en: A hundred, then.
translation.zh: 那就100美金

translation.en: This man is the only reason we're still alive.
translation.zh: 别忘了是这个人让我们还都活着

translation.en: We were 45 men when this started. Now we're ten. Almost nine.
translation.zh: 队长 我们出来的时候是四十五人 现在就剩十个了 或者说九个

translation.en: HAWK: He's my father. He can have my share.
translation.zh: 他是我的父亲 我那份给你

translation.en: JIM: Mine too. He can have my share also.
translation.zh: 我也一样 我那份钱也可以给你

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 那好 既然布里杰先生也这么想

translation.en: If Mr. Bridger feels the same way, I'll lag behind with them.
translation.zh: 那好 既然布里杰先生也这么想 那我愿意和他们一起留下来

translation.en: -You? -Yep.
translation.zh: 你？

translation.en: You already lost my share of the pelts...
translation.zh: 是的 既然我的那份货都丢了

translation.en: ...so I got no choice but to make it up by some other means.
translation.zh: 总得在别的地方找补一下损失吧

translation.en: Sticking around for another day or two don't make no difference.
translation.zh: 再说 多呆一两天也没有什么区别

translation.en: $300, at least I get to go home with something.
translation.zh: 三百美金让我回家还不至于空着手

translation.en: Glass is to be cared for until, understood?
translation.zh: 你们一定要看护好格拉斯 直到… 明白吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You have my word. I understand.
translation.zh: 当然 我向您保证 我明白

translation.en: HENRY: You boys get him down off this slope...
translation.zh: 你们几个天黑前把他抬到坡下

translation.en: ...and somewhere safe before dark.
translation.zh: 找个安全的地方安顿好

translation.en: -Fitzgerald. FITZGERALD: Captain.
translation.zh: -菲茨杰拉德 -头儿

translation.en: Glass is to be cared for as long as necessary.
translation.zh: 必要时他走之后

translation.en: And a proper burial when it's time.
translation.zh: 把他妥善安葬

translation.en: He's earned it.
translation.zh: 这是他应有的待遇

translation.en: I understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: You hurt yourself?
translation.zh: 你受伤了？

translation.en: ANDERSON: I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: Can you hear that wind, father?
translation.zh: 爸爸你听到风声了吗？

translation.en: Remember what mother used to say about the wind?
translation.zh: 你还记得妈妈是怎么说风的？

translation.en: The wind cannot defeat a tree with strong roots.
translation.zh: 风吹不倒根深的大树

translation.en: You are still breathing...
translation.zh: 你还有一口气…

translation.en: I miss her so much.
translation.zh: 我真想她呀

translation.en: GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: I will be right here...
translation.zh: 我会一直在这里

translation.en: I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里

translation.en: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.zh: 只要还有一口气 你就要战斗

translation.en: You breathe. Keep breathing.
translation.zh: 吸气 一直吸气

translation.en: WIFE [IN PAWNEE]: When there is a storm...
translation.zh: 当风暴来临时

translation.en: And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.zh: 你站在一棵大树前

translation.en: If you look at the branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.zh: 你看着它的枝叶 觉得它一定会落下来

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.zh: 但是你再看它的树干 树干纹丝不动

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Three hundred bucks goes a long way toward retirement.
translation.zh: 三百美金可是够花到退休了

translation.en: Go down to Texas, find me a decent piece of land, and start pissing in the wind.
translation.zh: 对 去德克萨斯买块好地 就可以享清福了

translation.en: Get me the hell out of this godforsaken place.
translation.zh: 快让我离开这鬼地方吧

translation.en: JIM: Ree done that to you?
translation.zh: 这是阿里卡拉人干的？

translation.en: I'm just asking.
translation.zh: 我在问你呢

translation.en: Yeah, they done it.
translation.zh: 对 是他们干的

translation.en: They took their sweet time with it.
translation.zh: 他们拿这个取乐

translation.en: At the start, I didn't feel nothing. I just heard the sound...
translation.zh: 开始我还没觉得什么

translation.en: ...of the knife scraping against my skull...
translation.zh: 就听到刀子从我的头皮掠过

translation.en: ...and them all laughing and whooping and hollering and whatnot.
translation.zh: 然后他们就笑 起哄 喊叫

translation.en: Then the blood came.
translation.zh: 然后血就流出来了

translation.en: It was cold. It started streaming down my face, in my eyes...
translation.zh: 血是冷凉的 流到我脸上 眼睛里 鼻子里

translation.en: ...and breathing it in. Choking on it.
translation.zh: 我一吸气 被血呛住了

translation.en: That's when I felt it.
translation.zh: 那时候我才感觉到

translation.en: Yeah, felt all of it.
translation.zh: 就是那感觉

translation.en: I got my head turned inside out.
translation.zh: 我整个头皮被削了下去

translation.en: JIM: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Them Indians down Texas way...
translation.zh: 对 那些印第安人到了德克萨斯

translation.en: ...they may rob you, but they ain't gonna take your topknot.
translation.zh: 他们抢劫你 但不会削你头皮

translation.en: JIM: When was it?
translation.zh: 什么时候的事？

translation.en: Goddamn it, will you quit that noise now, will you?
translation.zh: 妈的 你能不能 别再弄那个噪音了 行吗？

translation.en: Quit it.
translation.zh: 赶紧停了

translation.en: FITZGERALD: I'm falling further back... ...from Henry and the boys on account of tending to you.
translation.zh: 我没跟亨利和大家走 就是为了留下照顾你

translation.en: Got to get up the damn mountain, but winter keeps chasing us down.
translation.zh: 我们还得爬山 冬天爬山很危险的

translation.en: If you ready to take the sacrament...
translation.zh: 你要是准备好了接受最后圣礼

translation.en: ...I can do that for you.
translation.zh: 我可以为你做

translation.en: What you holding to, Glass?
translation.zh: 格拉斯你还等什么呢？

translation.en: You know...
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: ...it would be better...
translation.zh: 你现在就咽气的话

translation.en: ...if you were to take that last breath of yours now...
translation.zh: 对我们所有人来说

translation.en: ...for all of us.
translation.zh: 都是最好的结果

translation.en: Now you hung tough.
translation.zh: 现在 你这么挺着

translation.en: And that's something.
translation.zh: 确实令人起敬

translation.en: I'm begging you.
translation.zh: 我求你了格拉斯

translation.en: Them Ree are so close I can smell 'em. You can smell 'em too.
translation.zh: 阿里卡拉人离的太近了 我能闻见他们的气味 我知道你也能闻到他们的味

translation.en: You got to think of your boy. All right? 'Cause you're gonna kill him.
translation.zh: 你想想 为你的儿子想想 你会要了他的命的

translation.en: You'll kill us all.
translation.zh: 你会要了我们所有人的命

translation.en: I can muzzle you if you like.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你捂着 要是你愿意的话

translation.en: Take away this suffering quick and easy. No one ever has to know that you give up.
translation.zh: 这样可以轻松摆脱痛苦 没人知道是你自己放弃的 我可以帮你做

translation.en: All you have to do is blink if you want me to do that.
translation.zh: 你要是愿意就眨眨眼睛

translation.en: Save your boy and blink.
translation.zh: 眨眼睛吧 救了你的儿子

translation.en: You just have to blink.
translation.zh: 你眨眼就是了

translation.en: Yeah. There it is.
translation.zh: 对 这就对了

translation.en: You'd best hope the good Lord'll get His ass here quick, huh?
translation.zh: 你想让上帝早点现身不是嘛

translation.en: Maybe He'll forgive your sins, maybe not.
translation.zh: 也许上帝会饶恕你的罪过 也许不会

translation.en: Thus I do commend thee to the Lord.
translation.zh: 我可以把你交给上帝了吧

translation.en: Through Jesus Christ the Lord of all reality and mercy...
translation.zh: 经过耶稣基督 现实和仁慈的上帝… 圣父 创造者 我把你

translation.en: ...and the Father and the Creator, I hold thee--
translation.zh: 圣父 创造者 我把你

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH] Get away! Get away!
translation.zh: 走开 走开 你没事吧

translation.en: You okay? Jim! Jim! Help!
translation.zh: 走开 你没事吧 吉米 吉米 快来呀

translation.en: HAWK: Help! -Calm down. Jim! Help!
translation.zh: 冷静 你听到我说的了

translation.en: Don't shout! You're gonna get us all killed!
translation.zh: 你冷静一下 你这样会要了我们的命

translation.en: Keep away! I'll tell the captain what you did.
translation.zh: 你这样会要了我们的命 我会告诉吉米和队长你都干了什么

translation.en: They'll hang you!
translation.zh: 他们会吊死你的

translation.en: -They'll hang you! Jim, help! -We have an understanding.
translation.zh: 他们会吊死你的 -吉米 快来！ -我们互相理解

translation.en: What's fucking wrong with you people?
translation.zh: 你这就让我没有选择了

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: JIM: I got one beaver, Hawk.
translation.zh: 我逮了只河狸 霍克

translation.en: Breathing changed?
translation.zh: 他呼吸不对

translation.en: I hadn't noticed.
translation.zh: 我没注意到

translation.en: Damn, he's cold as ice.
translation.zh: 糟了 他的身体冰冷

translation.en: Here you go, Mr. Glass. This will help you. Keep you warm.
translation.zh: 没事的 格拉斯先生 这个会让你暖和起来

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: Where's Hawk?
translation.zh: 霍克呢？

translation.en: He ain't with you?
translation.zh: 他不是和你在一起吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: No?
translation.zh: 没有？

translation.en: I understand, Mr. Glass.
translation.zh: 我明白 格拉斯先生

translation.en: It's all right. I think I'll get a fire going.
translation.zh: 没事的 我生上火就会暖和起来

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Yeah. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.zh: 好 这主意不错

translation.en: JIM: Hawk!
translation.zh: 霍克

translation.en: Hawk!
translation.zh: 霍克

translation.en: FITZGERALD [WHISPERING]: Shh. Ree.
translation.zh: -阿里卡拉人来了 -什么？

translation.en: There's about 20 of them down by the creek.
translation.zh: 大约有二十人沿着溪边过来

translation.en: They're headed this way. Grab your shit and let's go.
translation.zh: 朝这个方向来了 快拿上你的东西走吧

translation.en: Shit. What do we do?
translation.zh: 糟了 等等 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Run, right now.
translation.zh: 逃走 马上

translation.en: -What about Hawk? -He ain't our problem no more.
translation.zh: 那霍克怎么办？ 顾不了他了

translation.en: We can't just leave him.
translation.zh: 我们也不能把他留在这里

translation.en: Either he's gutted or scalped. And if he ain't he can find us, can't he?
translation.zh: 他不是被拆了胳膊腿就是被剥了皮 要是没有 他就能找到我们

translation.en: What about Glass?
translation.zh: 格拉斯先生怎么办？

translation.en: He ain't our problem. Like us, he's on his own.
translation.zh: 顾不上他了 他也好自为之吧

translation.en: We made a promise to the captain. A proper burial when the time was needed.
translation.zh: 不不不 我们向队长保证过的 好好地安葬他

translation.en: He needs that rifle!
translation.zh: 他需要那条枪

translation.en: He couldn't do nothing with it if you tarred it to his hand.
translation.zh: 他现在这样 根本开不了枪 拿上你的东西 走吧

translation.en: We can't do this.
translation.zh: 不 不行 我们不能这么做

translation.en: We got no fucking choice.
translation.zh: 我们没别的出路 小子

translation.en: JIM: No, we can't. Look at him.
translation.zh: 不 不…我们不能这么做

translation.en: All right, shit, then, buddy. Get him up. You want to take him?
translation.zh: 你看他 快 把他扶起来

translation.en: Come on now!
translation.zh: 快点 你想带上他？那走吧

translation.en: JIM: Easy. Slowly, Fitz. Easy with him.
translation.zh: 冷静 够了 菲茨

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Just get your shit.
translation.zh: 拿上你的东西

translation.en: Get your shit!
translation.zh: 拿上你的东西

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: Fitz. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 菲茨 你干嘛？

translation.en: What does it look like? Proper burial. Like you wanted.
translation.zh: 你说呢？ 安葬他啊 像你希望的那样

translation.en: JIM: No, not like this.
translation.zh: 不 不 不是这样的

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不？

translation.en: He's alive, Fitz. He's alive.
translation.zh: 他还活着呢 菲茨 他还活着

translation.en: So shoot him.
translation.zh: 那就崩了他

translation.en: I have to go. I have to go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mr. Glass. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起 格拉斯先生 对不起

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: MURPHY: Captain! This way!
translation.zh: 队长 走这边

translation.en: There's a path down here!
translation.zh: 能让我们穿过去吗？ 我们绕过去 那边有条路

translation.en: ANDERSON: There ain't shit down there! We got to climb over!
translation.zh: 骡子可下不去 我觉得那边应该还有条路

translation.en: JONES: Glass said to stay east! ANDERSON: Glass can go to hell!
translation.zh: 告诉他们返回来 我们得翻山过去 格拉斯见鬼去吧！

translation.en: HENRY: What's the map say?
translation.zh: 地图怎么标的？

translation.en: Keep climbing. We climb, Captain. We keep climbing.
translation.zh: 继续登山 我们登山 队长 我们接着登山

translation.en: Till we reach Old Gabe.
translation.zh: 直到遇见老盖博

translation.en: We climb.
translation.zh: 我们登山

translation.en: We got to wait for Murph.
translation.zh: 等等墨菲

translation.en: ANDERSON: Yeah. You wait for him.
translation.zh: 是吗？你等他吧

translation.en: Captain?
translation.zh: 队长

translation.en: Sir...
translation.zh: 队长？墨菲说那边有条路

translation.en: ...Murphy says there's a way down there. Who we following?
translation.zh: 队长？墨菲说那边有条路 为什么不走？

translation.en: ANDERSON: You follow who you want! I'm going up!
translation.zh: 你愿意跟谁就跟着 我反正往上走

translation.en: Stubby, keep going up!
translation.zh: 墩子 接着往上走

translation.en: JONES: Murph! Come here!
translation.zh: 墨菲 快过来！

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm not leaving you, son.
translation.zh: 我不会离开你 儿子

translation.en: I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Fire's done.
translation.zh: 火灭了

translation.en: I can't even feel my feet.
translation.zh: 我的脚都木了

translation.en: Didn't we put enough distance between us and them Ree?
translation.zh: 再说 离阿里卡拉人还远着呢

translation.en: A dozen Ree can make twice as good time as we can.
translation.zh: 十几个阿里卡拉人比我们要快上一倍

translation.en: -Twenty. -What?
translation.zh: -二十个 -什么？

translation.en: You said you saw twenty Ree.
translation.zh: 你之前说看到有二十个

translation.en: Yeah? What you talking about?
translation.zh: 是 你什么意思？

translation.en: -You woke me up. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 你叫醒我时说的

translation.en: You said you saw twenty Ree by the creek.
translation.zh: 你说看到二十个阿里卡拉人沿河过来

translation.en: Well, yeah, twenty, a dozen...
translation.zh: 对 二十个…还是十几个

translation.en: ...it don't matter. I wasn't gonna hang around counting fucking feathers.
translation.zh: 有什么要紧？ 我真没有挨个数那些鸟人

translation.en: As a matter of fact...
translation.zh: 问题是

translation.en: ...what was you doing down by the creek all by yourself?
translation.zh: 你一个人跑河边干什么去了？

translation.en: I'd already brought up plenty of water.
translation.zh: 我已经打满水回来了

translation.en: Answer me, Fitzgerald. I asked you a question.
translation.zh: 说话呀 菲茨杰拉德 我问你话呢

translation.en: Don't question me on account of you feel guilty.
translation.zh: 你把格拉斯丢一边不管 心里内疚 现在就来审问我 回答我不然就打爆你的头

translation.en: Answer me or I'll blow your head off.
translation.zh: 现在就来审问我 回答我不然就打爆你的头

translation.en: You got a short memory, boy.
translation.zh: 你脑子断片了吧

translation.en: Your ass would be floating around the Missouri right now... ...if it wasn't for me.
translation.zh: 要不是我 你现在还漂在密苏里河上呢

translation.en: You want to ask questions?
translation.zh: 你想问是吧？你想问什么？

translation.en: What you want to ask? If you want to know, ask it.
translation.zh: 你想问是吧？你想问什么？ 问吧

translation.en: You want to know why you left Mr. Glass back there for dead, huh?
translation.zh: 你想知道为什么 你把格拉斯丢下等死？

translation.en: Or why you left your little boyfriend running around?
translation.zh: 或者 你为什么丢了你的好朋友 现在还不知道他是死是活

translation.en: You want to know if he's still alive?
translation.zh: 现在还不知道他是死是活 这就是你想问的？

translation.en: I'll tell you why. It's 'cause you ain't a man yet.
translation.zh: 让我来告诉你为什么 因为你不是个男人 对吗？

translation.en: It's 'cause you was scared shitless. You're scared now.
translation.zh: 让我来告诉你为什么 因为你不是个男人 对吗？ 因为你太害怕了 心虚了 把枪放下

translation.en: The Ree.
translation.zh: 那些阿里卡拉人

translation.en: What of them?
translation.zh: 你想知道什么？

translation.en: Tell me, did you see 'em?
translation.zh: 老实告诉我 你真的看到他们了吗？

translation.en: -Put your rifle down. -Did you see the Ree?
translation.zh: -把枪放下 -你有没有看到阿里卡拉人

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Not a single one.
translation.zh: 一个都没有

translation.en: You fucking lied to me? You lied to me!
translation.zh: 你骗我 你骗我

translation.en: I had to scare some sense into you, boy.
translation.zh: 小子 别说我吓唬你

translation.en: Glass was dead. Hawk we don't know about.
translation.zh: 格拉斯死了 霍克去向不明

translation.en: No point in either of us dying either, you understand?
translation.zh: 咱俩再死一个就不值了 你明白吗？

translation.en: The way I see it, I saved your life twice now. I ought to be God to you.
translation.zh: 我救了你两次命 我应该是你上帝

translation.en: And God giveth and God taketh away.
translation.zh: 上帝给你命 也可以要你命

translation.en: Lucky fucker.
translation.zh: 你真是走了狗屎运

translation.en: Next time you want to shoot somebody...
translation.zh: 下次用枪射人的话

translation.en: ...you might want to use powder, prime your rifle.
translation.zh: 记着用火药 给枪装上火药

translation.en: Come on. Let's git. Grab your shit.
translation.zh: 走吧 离开这儿 拿上你的东西

translation.en: Fresh blood. This could be Powaqa.
translation.zh: 鲜血 可能是普瓦卡的

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] A dead boy.
translation.zh: 已经死了

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] A Pawnee boy.
translation.zh: 一个波尼族男孩

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Who did this?
translation.zh: 谁干的？

translation.en: FITZGERALD: I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Could be Captain Leavenworth's boys.
translation.zh: 好像是莱文沃思上尉的人

translation.en: Put some eyes on the back of your head.
translation.zh: 后背也得长眼睛

translation.en: These Injuns ain't never as dead as you think they are.
translation.zh: 这些印第安人有时会装死

translation.en: Look at 'em, huh? They're always stealing our shit.
translation.zh: 你看看 看到了吗？ 他们总是偷我们东西

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We got horses over here!
translation.zh: 哈 我们这回有马了！

translation.en: Hey, Bridger.
translation.zh: 行了 布里杰…

translation.en: We got horses!
translation.zh: 我们有马了！

translation.en: JIM: What you want to do about these pigs?
translation.zh: 要不要搞点肉

translation.en: FITZGERALD: The Lord's on our side, kid.
translation.zh: 老天还是挺照顾我们的 小子

translation.en: FITZGERALD: You all right there, kid?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 小子？

translation.en: Your head in the right place?
translation.zh: 脑子还正常吧？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 还好

translation.en: I can't help thinking about whether we did the right--
translation.zh: 我总在想是否做了件错事 不是 你就是个凡人

translation.en: Ain't our place to wonder. The good Lord...
translation.zh: 不是 你就是个凡人

translation.en: ...got us on a road whether we choose it or not.
translation.zh: 是上帝把我们引到这条路上的 不是我们选不选的事

translation.en: My pop, he weren't a religious man, you know?
translation.zh: 我父亲 他从不信教的

translation.en: If you couldn't grow it, kill it, or eat it, he just plain old didn't believe in it.
translation.zh: 又不能种不能长不能吃的 反正他死活是不信

translation.en: And this one time he head on up the old Saba hills. San Saba hills?
translation.zh: 他就是那样 有一次他去沙巴山 圣沙巴山

translation.en: He joined a couple Texas Ranger buddies of his to hunt.
translation.zh: 和两个德克萨斯哥们去打猎

translation.en: Pretty routine. He done it like a hundred times before.
translation.zh: 这种平常的打猎 以前有过好多次了

translation.en: Should have been a 3-day kill, but on the second day...
translation.zh: 三天应该就够了 可是第二天搞砸了

translation.en: ...it all went fucked.
translation.zh: 可是第二天搞砸了

translation.en: Somehow that night he lost his buddies.
translation.zh: 不知怎么的他朋友挂了

translation.en: And to top it off...
translation.zh: 更糟糕的是 卡曼其人还抢走了他们的马

translation.en: ...them Comanches went and took the horses.
translation.zh: 更糟糕的是 卡曼其人还抢走了他们的马 所以…

translation.en: So he was starving and delirious...
translation.zh: 他快饿死了 崩溃了…

translation.en: ...and he crawls up into this mott...
translation.zh: 爬到了一个像这样的小树林里

translation.en: ...this group of trees out in the middle of nowhere...
translation.zh: 一个不知名的鬼地方

translation.en: ...just sticking up in this ocean of scrub...
translation.zh: 一个不知名的鬼地方 到处都是灌木丛

translation.en: ...and he found religion.
translation.zh: 在那儿他找到了宗教

translation.en: At that moment, he told me...
translation.zh: 那时候他告诉我

translation.en: ...he found God.
translation.zh: 他找到了上帝

translation.en: And it turns out that God....
translation.zh: 原来 上帝

translation.en: He's a squirrel.
translation.zh: 是只松鼠

translation.en: Yeah. A big, old meaty one.
translation.zh: 一只肥大的松鼠

translation.en: "I found God," he used to say.
translation.zh: 我找到了上帝 他常这么说

translation.en: "And while sitting there and basking in the glory and sublimity of mercy...
translation.zh: 它坐在那儿 充满了不知道是荣耀还是怜悯

translation.en: ...I shot and ate that son of a bitch."
translation.zh: 我给了那兔崽子一枪 把它给吃了

translation.en: Yeah. You might want to close your eyes, kid.
translation.zh: 你可能…想眯一觉吧 小子

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm injured.
translation.zh: 我受伤了

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] What happened to you?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: A bear.
translation.zh: 一只熊

translation.en: A bear.
translation.zh: 一只熊

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] My men... left me for dead.
translation.zh: 我的人 离我而去

translation.en: Killed my son.
translation.zh: 杀了我儿子

translation.en: I lost my family too.
translation.zh: 我也没有家人了

translation.en: Sioux killed my people.
translation.zh: 阿里卡拉人杀了他们

translation.en: I'm going south to find more Pawnee.
translation.zh: 我要到南边再找些我们的人来

translation.en: My heart bleeds...
translation.zh: 我的心在滴血

translation.en: But revenge is in the creator's hands.
translation.zh: 复仇之剑在上帝手里 不在人手里

translation.en: You will ride with me...
translation.zh: 你跟我一起骑马走…

translation.en: HIKUC: Your body is rotten.
translation.zh: 你伤口化脓了

translation.en: Need to heal.
translation.zh: 需要治疗

translation.en: You could die.
translation.zh: 不然你会死的

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Yeah! There she is.
translation.zh: 前面就到了

translation.en: We did it.
translation.zh: 我们终于到了

translation.en: You ought to be proud of yourself, boy.
translation.zh: 你应该自豪啊 小子

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: We followed orders. We just skipped the funeral part.
translation.zh: 我们执行了老大的命令 唯一没做的就是安葬

translation.en: Don't go down there and start growing no conscience.
translation.zh: 到了要塞就别再唠叨自责了行吗？ 晚上总要到来不是？

translation.en: 'Cause sure as night'll come they'll have us swinging from a couple ropes.
translation.zh: 晚上总要到来不是？ 要是让他们知道了 咱俩都得被吊死

translation.en: We did what we had to do.
translation.zh: 我们该做的都做了

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We had the extra day so we managed to dig...
translation.zh: 我们又多呆了一天

translation.en: ...a little deeper, lay rocks on top so scavengers couldn't get at him.
translation.zh: 尽量想把墓穴 挖的深点 在上面又盖了些石头

translation.en: It was done right and all. He was buried right.
translation.zh: 免得被野狗们刨开 都安排得妥妥的 他算是被厚葬了

translation.en: -Sir, can we-- -The truth is that...
translation.zh: -先生 我能… -事情是…这样的

translation.en: ...ahem, when Hawk disappeared, I was worried about savages.
translation.zh: 当时霍克失踪了 我担心是阿里卡拉人干的

translation.en: And I was ready to get, to move on out.
translation.zh: 也准备去找 后来因为要逃命 你懂的

translation.en: Yeah, but Bridger here argued to stay.
translation.zh: 布里杰 他想多呆

translation.en: He argued to stay... ...so he could at least build a cross or something...
translation.zh: 他想多呆 这样就可以弄个十字架或者什么的…

translation.en: ...to put on top of Glass's grave, and that's what he did. That's what we did.
translation.zh: 放到格拉斯的墓上 他也这么做了 这个 我们也这么做了

translation.en: I'm glad you pulled your weight, Mr. Bridger.
translation.zh: 很高兴你在这件事情上尽力了 布里杰先生 -我知道你会的 -可不嘛 不只是做了他该做的事情 老大

translation.en: He more than pulled his weight, captain. This man here, he was my partner.
translation.zh: -我知道你会的 -可不嘛 不只是做了他该做的事情 老大 他还 他还是我的伙伴

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Am I to assume that the agreed arrangement did not change?
translation.zh: 那我 还应该认为 当初的约定没有变？

translation.en: Uh, fortunately for me, it did not.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我这儿没变

translation.en: Thank you...
translation.zh: 感谢

translation.en: ...for your courage, honor, and service.
translation.zh: 你的勇气 守信和辛苦 对

translation.en: Deal or no deal, Mr. Bridger, you deserve something for what you did.
translation.zh: 有没有当初的约定 布里杰先生 对于你所做的一切 你都应该得到报酬

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Kid's been beating himself up awful bad the whole trip.
translation.zh: 这孩子一直在深深自责…

translation.en: We all saw the shape Glass was in.
translation.zh: 这一路上 格拉斯的状况我们当时也看到了

translation.en: There was no more to be done. Right?
translation.zh: 已经无能为力了 对吗？

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: We all saw him.
translation.zh: 我们都看到了

translation.en: WIFE: When there is a storm...
translation.zh: 当风暴来临时

translation.en: And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.zh: 你站在一棵大树前

translation.en: If you look at its branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.zh: 你看着它的枝叶 觉得它一定会落下来

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.zh: 但是你再看它的树干 树干纹丝不动

translation.en: SCOUT [IN ARIKARA]: There are traces of a camp...
translation.zh: 发现一个营地

translation.en: There are traces of a camp...

translation.zh: 进入月亮林

translation.en: Tell the others.

translation.zh: 把那个姑娘带过来

translation.en: Those five horses weren't for free.
translation.zh: 那五匹马可不是白给的

translation.en: Shh.
translation.zh: 嘘

translation.zh: 别出声

translation.zh: 我去牵匹马来

translation.zh: 我非骟了你不可

translation.en: MAN [IN FRENCH]: Where is Toussaint?
translation.zh: 杜桑去哪了

translation.en: GLASS: Come here...
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: FITZGERALD: May I join you? HENRY: Yes.
translation.zh: -我能一起坐吗？ -好的

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yes.
translation.zh: -好？ -好的

translation.en: I was wondering when we might be getting paid for that haul.
translation.zh: 头儿 我在想 上次咱们那笔生意的钱 什么时候给呀？

translation.en: 'Cause them pelts we collected are still out there, you know...
translation.zh: 上次咱们那笔生意的钱 什么时候给呀？ 因为 我们收的那些皮子 现在还在那儿呢

translation.en: ...under a couple foot of dirt and snow. But that ain't my fault.
translation.zh: 土堆和雪堆里埋着呢 可是 这些货丢在那儿 不是我的错呀

translation.en: I'm waiting for Captain Leavenworth to arrive with his army.
translation.zh: 我在等莱文沃思将军和他的部队

translation.en: Then we'll have enough men...
translation.zh: 那时候我们就有足够的人马杀回去

translation.en: ...to shoot some civilization into those fucking Arikara and get back our pelts.
translation.zh: 用文明扫荡那些该死的阿里卡拉人 把我们的皮货弄回来

translation.en: All right. All right.
translation.zh: 那好

translation.en: When's that supposed to happen?
translation.zh: 那大约什么时候到？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 还不知道

translation.en: But until then, nobody gets paid.
translation.zh: 但是 到那时候才能领钱

translation.en: Listen here, all right?
translation.zh: 你听着 我当初是被雇来打猎的

translation.en: I was hired to trap 'em. I wasn't hired to guard 'em.
translation.zh: 我当初是被雇来打猎的 不是来守货的

translation.en: The way I see it, now you, you got a safe.
translation.zh: 我是这么想的 现在你 你有一个保险箱 这么说

translation.en: It's probably full of money.
translation.zh: 那保险箱里说不定装满了钱呢

translation.en: You signed a contract to protect your boss...
translation.zh: 你签的合同是 保护你老板和他的财产…

translation.en: ...and your boss's property.
translation.zh: 保护你老板和他的财产…

translation.en: And that safe isn't full anymore. It's short about $300.
translation.zh: 那个保险箱的钱已经不满了 已经少了三百 少了？

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: 这到底他妈什么意思？

translation.en: It means, according to my records...
translation.zh: 我的意思是 根据我的现金记录

translation.en: ...you purchased more goods on the expedition... ...than what you are owed by the company.
translation.zh: 你这趟买货花的钱多于公司欠你的钱

translation.en: Now, Happy New Year, Fitzgerald.
translation.zh: 新年快乐 菲茨杰拉德

translation.en: GUARD: Fryman! White man at the gate!
translation.zh: 弗里曼 门口来了个白人

translation.en: Speak English.
translation.zh: 说英语

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] I have no weapon.
translation.zh: 我没有武器 我没有武器

translation.en: Open her up!
translation.zh: 开开门

translation.en: Get the captain!
translation.zh: 汤姆 叫队长过来

translation.en: HENRY: Where are your men?
translation.zh: 你的人呢？

translation.en: All dead.
translation.zh: 死了 都死了

translation.en: Who was he?
translation.zh: 谁干的？

translation.en: I don't know. Something to eat, please?
translation.zh: 我不知道 能给我点吃的吗？

translation.en: Food comes at a price.
translation.zh: 吃的要收钱的

translation.en: -I have no money. -Then you don't eat.
translation.zh: -我 我没有钱 -那就别吃了 你看这样行吗？

translation.en: Give back some of them stolen pelts you buy from the Injuns.
translation.zh: 也许你可以 把印第安人偷去卖给你的皮子

translation.en: -Not now, Jones. -Huh?
translation.zh: -再还给我们 -现在不行 琼斯

translation.en: Silver. How is this? Silver.
translation.zh: 银器 这个行吗？银的

translation.en: This all you got?
translation.zh: 你只有这个？

translation.en: We was nine.
translation.zh: 我们 九个人

translation.en: My friend, he die in the snow.
translation.zh: 我的朋友 他死了 在雪地里

translation.en: And the other was...
translation.zh: 另一个 他 被狼咬死了

translation.en: ...kill by wolf. I see it.
translation.zh: 我 我亲眼看见

translation.en: By wolf, yeah, kill.
translation.zh: 这样 被狼 对 被狼咬死了

translation.en: Where'd you get this?
translation.zh: 你哪里来的这个？

translation.en: Canteen.
translation.zh: 水壶

translation.zh: 他 他身上掉的 掉到雪地上

translation.en: -Who? Who? -I don't know. I don't see.
translation.zh: 他杀了杜桑 然后把这个掉了 我不知道 我没看见 没看见

translation.en: It could be Hawk.
translation.zh: 有可能是霍克

translation.en: Yeah, could be.
translation.zh: 对 有可能

translation.en: JONES: That half-breed runt couldn't steal no horse.
translation.zh: 那小杂种还没本事偷马

translation.en: -Maybe it was Weston. STUBBY BILL: Or Beckett.
translation.zh: 也可能是威斯顿

translation.en: How far from here?
translation.zh: 离这里多远？

translation.en: Thirty mile.
translation.zh: 三 三十英里

translation.en: Northwest, near the Yellowstone.
translation.zh: 北 北 西北边

translation.en: The Yellowstone!
translation.zh: 靠近黄石

translation.en: Get the horses saddled. Torches and supplies.
translation.zh: 给马备上鞍 准备好火把和食物

translation.en: Ten dollars a man.
translation.zh: 每人10块钱

translation.en: Anderson, you stay here.
translation.zh: 安德森 你留下

translation.en: ANDERSON: Yes, sir. Feed him and watch him.
translation.zh: 是 先生 我会看好他

translation.en: I'll get you a drink.
translation.zh: 我去给你弄点喝的

translation.en: HENRY: When we get to the Yellowstone, we split into two groups!
translation.zh: -等我们到达黄石的时候分成两路 -是 头儿

translation.zh: 霍克

translation.zh: 霍克 你在吗？

translation.zh: 保持警惕

translation.zh: 看清楚一点

translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.zh: 贝克特？ 是你吗？

translation.zh: -是格拉斯 -格拉斯

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
translation.zh: 我的上帝啊

translation.zh: 我的上帝 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Where is he?
translation.zh: 他在哪？

translation.en: HENRY: Jones, take him. Go.
translation.zh: 琼斯 带他回去

translation.en: I'm riding ahead. Bill, take Bridger.
translation.zh: 我在前面走 比尔… 拿下布里杰

translation.en: Take Bridger!
translation.zh: 拿下布里杰！ 没事了 格拉斯

translation.en: -Have you seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
translation.zh: -你看到菲茨杰拉德了吗？ -没有 先生

translation.en: Get up. Get up!
translation.zh: 起来 起来

translation.en: -You seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
translation.zh: -看到菲茨杰拉德了吗？ -没有 先生

translation.en: Fitzgerald?
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德？

translation.en: Whoa, easy.
translation.zh: 冷静

translation.en: Where did he go?
translation.zh: 他去哪儿了？

translation.en: -Who? -Fitzgerald. Where did he go?
translation.zh: -谁？ -菲茨杰拉德 他去哪儿了？

translation.en: -I have no idea. -Tell me or I'll take your head off.
translation.zh: -我不知道 -告诉我 不然要你脑袋

translation.en: I swear to God--
translation.zh: 我对上帝发誓 我真的不知道

translation.en: Tell me. Tell me!
translation.zh: 告诉我 告诉我

translation.en: Texas!
translation.zh: 德克萨斯

translation.en: He said he was going to Texas. He said he was gonna reenlist.
translation.zh: 他说过要去德克萨斯 我对上帝发誓 他说过要去当兵

translation.en: Then he started talking about property. "A decent piece of land."
translation.zh: 我对上帝发誓 他说过要去当兵 要买块地

translation.en: He's heading for Texas. That's all I know.
translation.zh: 他要去德克萨斯 我发誓就知道这些了

translation.en: Stay here.
translation.zh: 待在这儿

translation.en: Fitzgerald!
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德

translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德

translation.en: Goddamn it!
translation.zh: 他妈的 畜生

translation.en: Goddamn it!
translation.zh: 畜生 畜生

translation.zh: 门口有人？ 琼斯 叫队长来！

translation.en: -Fryman! JONES: Open the gate!
translation.zh: -弗里曼 -打开门

translation.en: GUARD: Open it up!
translation.zh: 打开门

translation.en: JONES: Murphy, get the Captain.
translation.zh: 叫队长来！

translation.en: HENRY: Get him to the doctor. Now!
translation.zh: 快叫医生来 马上

translation.en: You said he was dead! You said he was dead!
translation.zh: 是你说的他死了！ 你说他死了！

translation.en: I thought he was, I swear!
translation.zh: 我以为他死了 队长 我发誓！

translation.en: JIM: He lied to me! HENRY: You're a liar.
translation.zh: 我以为他死了 骗子

translation.en: You left him out there!
translation.zh: 老实说 我…队长 我发誓他死了 我以为他死了

translation.en: Say the Lord's Prayer.
translation.zh: -做最后的祷告吧 -什么？

translation.en: Say the Lord's Prayer!
translation.zh: 做最后的祷告

translation.en: Our Father, Who art in heaven. Who art-- I can't!
translation.zh: 我们在天上的父啊 在天 在天的 -我说不下去了 -住口

translation.en: Shut up! Shut up!
translation.zh: -请相信 队长 我没有… -闭嘴

translation.en: From here out, you're a prisoner charged with treason!
translation.zh: 从现在起 你就是个通敌罪犯

translation.en: Take him to the cage! Take him to the cage or you'll hang alongside him!
translation.zh: 求你别杀我 把他带到牢里去 要不然你跟他一样下场

translation.en: I thought he was gonna die!
translation.zh: 队长 我不可能 我真以为他要死了

translation.en: Fitz lied to me!
translation.zh: 求你 别杀我

translation.en: I couldn't help him!
translation.zh: 我没能 没能帮助他 求你了

translation.en: How is he?
translation.zh: 他怎么样了？

translation.en: DOCTOR: He'll be fine, but there is swelling. He needs to rest. I'll be back to check up on him.
translation.zh: 恐怕他需要休息 我一会再回来检查

translation.en: GLASS: He ran off, didn't he?
translation.zh: 他跑了 是吗？

translation.en: Bridger's telling the truth.
translation.zh: 布里杰说的是实话

translation.en: How's that?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Fitzgerald lied to him. He was just following orders.
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德骗了他 他只是听命令罢了

translation.en: He wasn't there when Fitzgerald stabbed my boy to death.
translation.zh: 菲茨杰拉德杀我儿子的时侯 他不在场

translation.en: Is that what happened?
translation.zh: 原来这么回事

translation.en: He killed Hawk.
translation.zh: 他杀了霍克？

translation.en: I need a horse and gun.
translation.zh: 我需要一匹马和一杆枪

translation.en: No, you need to rest and eat. I'm going after him.
translation.zh: 不 你需要休息和吃饭 我会收拾他的

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: You'll never find him without me.
translation.zh: 没有我 你们找不到他

translation.en: If we wait till morning he'll get away.
translation.zh: 要是等到早上 他会跑掉的

translation.en: No, he won't.
translation.zh: 不 不会的

translation.en: He's afraid.
translation.zh: 他害怕了

translation.en: He knows how far I came for him.
translation.zh: 他知道我回来就是为了找他

translation.en: Same as that elk.
translation.zh: 就像麋鹿

translation.en: When they get afraid, they run deep into the woods.
translation.zh: 害怕的时候 它们会躲在林子深处

translation.en: I got him trapped. He just doesn't know it yet.
translation.zh: 我得给他设个套 他 他还不知道

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么确定？

translation.en: 'Cause he has everything to lose.
translation.zh: 因为他什么都不想失去

translation.en: All I had was that boy.
translation.zh: 而我除了儿子一无所有

translation.en: And he took him from me.
translation.zh: 现在儿子也被他夺走了

translation.en: I can't let you go back out there. Not again.
translation.zh: 我不会让你再回到那儿的

translation.en: I ain't afraid to die anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也不怕死了

translation.en: I done it already.
translation.zh: 我已经死过一回

translation.en: I'm going with you.
translation.zh: 我要跟你一起去

translation.en: GLASS: That's his horse, all right.
translation.zh: 他的马前腿跑不快

translation.en: No way he could've ridden through the night.
translation.zh: 骑着那匹马 天黑他走不远

translation.en: HENRY: How far ahead?
translation.zh: 前面有多远？

translation.en: Half a day at the most.
translation.zh: 半天的距离

translation.en: Could be Ree. If they aren't his, we lose him.
translation.zh: 应该是阿里卡拉人的马蹄印 如果不是他的 就跟丢了

translation.en: Unless he reenlisted so he could justify killing again...
translation.zh: 他要是真去当兵 杀人就更难管了

translation.en: ...these tracks right here are his.
translation.zh: 这些蹄子印应该是他的

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: HENRY: I can't remember my wife's face.
translation.zh: 我都忘了老婆长什么样了

translation.en: Last week, she was still with me.
translation.zh: 上星期还能记得

translation.en: Now she's gone.
translation.zh: 现在已经记不得了

translation.en: I worry I won't recognize her when I get back home.
translation.zh: 我真怕回家的时候认不出来她了

translation.en: Is it true you killed an officer?
translation.zh: 你真的杀过一个军官吗？

translation.en: I just killed the man who was trying to kill my son.
translation.zh: 我只是杀了一个要杀我儿子的人

translation.en: Smoke.
translation.zh: 烟味

translation.en: How close?
translation.zh: 有多近？

translation.en: No more than a mile up that way.
translation.zh: 不超过一英里远

translation.en: I'm gonna head up to the west. You go down to the east.
translation.zh: 我从西边过去 你从东边过去

translation.en: See if we can find some tracks.
translation.zh: 看看能否找到些线索

translation.en: And if it's the Ree?
translation.zh: 如果是阿里卡拉人怎么办？

translation.en: If it's the Ree, you turn right back around... ...and meet me back here. Tsk.
translation.zh: 要是那样 马上掉转头回来和我会面

translation.en: Now, I wouldn't expect to find a man of your stature...
translation.zh: 我可真没想到 您这样有地位的人

translation.en: ...so far away from his stove on a morning as cold as this, captain.
translation.zh: 会从温暖的火炉边 一大早跑到这个冷地方来 队长

translation.en: You lost?
translation.zh: 你 迷路了？

translation.en: I'm here to take you back to Fort Kiowa...
translation.zh: 我来是把你带回基奥瓦要塞

translation.en: ...where you will be tried for murder.
translation.zh: 让你接受谋杀罪审判

translation.en: Is that so?
translation.zh: 是吗？你的计划…

translation.en: I ain't crazy about your plan.
translation.zh: 我可不能捧场

translation.en: Besides, I got one of my own.
translation.zh: 再说 我也有自己的计划

translation.en: We had a deal, Glass!
translation.zh: 我们之间有过约定 格拉斯

translation.en: I tried to tell your boy, all right?
translation.zh: 我试着告诉你儿子 知道吗

translation.en: I tried to tell him, but he wouldn't listen and he kept on screaming.
translation.zh: 我试着告诉他发生的事 他就是不听… 还一直大叫

translation.en: He was gonna get everybody killed.
translation.zh: 他会让所有人送命的

translation.en: But you and me, we had a deal.
translation.zh: 你和我 我们之前说好的

translation.en: You know what happened out there.
translation.zh: 你们都知道怎么回事

translation.en: And on my soul, the Lord, He knows...
translation.zh: 我用灵魂发誓 上帝 上帝 他知道

translation.en: ...what happened out there.
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事！

translation.en: There was no deal.
translation.zh: 我们之间没有约定

translation.en: You killed my boy.
translation.zh: 你杀了我儿子

translation.en: Well, maybe you should've raised a man, instead of some girlie little bitch.
translation.zh: 你应该养一个真男人 而不是这种小娘炮

translation.en: Goddamn it.
translation.zh: 妈的 见鬼了

translation.en: You came all this way just for your revenge, huh?
translation.zh: 你老远跑回来就是为了复仇吗？

translation.en: Well, you enjoy it, Glass.
translation.zh: 好吧 过把瘾 格拉斯

translation.en: 'Cause there ain't nothing gonna bring your boy back.
translation.zh: 什么也换不回你儿子

translation.en: No, it won't.
translation.zh: 是换不回来

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] Revenge is in God's hands...
translation.zh: 复仇之剑掌握在上帝之手

translation.en: ...not mine.
translation.zh: 不在我手中
